website_summaries.verdict: A very large dry erase wall calendar that gives you quick viewing per month and can be erased and quickly changed.
pros: Box size for each date is large enough for a lot of writing
Can be customized for any month in any year
Not folded or creased in shipping
cons: This calendar only allows you to plan one month at a time
For the next month, you must erase and start over

customer_reviews.title: USE "SOFT SCRUB" TO ERASE!
customer_reviews.text: I love the large size for our family calendar. I also was frustrated with being unable to erase the dry erase a month later. Then, I discovered the solution - Soft Scrub! With it and a little water, everything comes completely off, and it's nice and clean and white for the next month's entries. (By the way, I use the all-purpose, bleach-free kind. I'm not sure how it would hold up to the bleach-containing kind. Who wants to breathe those fumes anyway?)
customer_reviews.author: JGal

customer_reviews.title: They say easy erase and that it works with dry erase markers ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars I would! They say easy erase and that it works with dry erase markers let me be the first to say they lied! Any other color then black will not come off even with heavy cleaner it stains and ruins the calendar. Had I known this I would not have bought this product and I think I will be calling their customer service department and demanding a full refund for this cheap product! I will be editing and posting pictures in a few minutes, DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Romero

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's huge
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's huge. (Definitely bigger than I expected). Unfortunately, I have to use Windex whenever I want to erase something because even using normal marker board markers, it doesn't wipe off like you would think. A minor set back but this has saved me from forgetting anything or being late. I would recommend it. It did not, howevet, come with tape or double sided tape to stick on the wall, I had to go buy Velcro strips to stick them on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3Angie

customer_reviews.title: Big Fan - Wet Erase Markers are Best!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this calendar! You definitely need to use WET ERASE (old school projector) markers. They wipe right off with water, no issues what so ever with color either. Size was a little big but I'm using for work week so just cut off Sat/Sun and it fit! Helps me keep track of everything I need with the large size box to write in. Big fan!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 12/2018, loved it so much we purchased an additional one a few months later. FABULOUS dry erase calendar. Have used a variety of marker brands. Every once in awhile we'll have a shadow after erasing a red or black that was there for a long time, but if we use a basic white board cleaner there's no shadowing left (can't remember what brand marker it was). We have mounted on the wall with Command's velcro mounting strips. Cannot comment on the markers that came with--gave them to the kids because I needed more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with memory loss.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly father so we could keep up with all his apartment's social events. It's perfect. It's mounted on the wall in his kitchen so he can see it every day. We are able to help him remember when and where events are scheduled so he can maintain an active social life even though his mind is aging. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: KGoldie

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. It was delivered flawlessly, without wrinkles or folds. It's huge with lots of lines for writing on. The markers erase well since it is laminated beautifully. I read a review about the stickers pulling off the walls, and pins tearing through the calendar, so I stuck a portion of the sticker tape to the back and poked a pin through it and the wall. It has worked perfectly. I am completely satisfied with my purchase. It is exactly what I wanted and what was promised.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriza

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend!!! The tape it came with didn't work well on my wall and when I took down what did stick well, it took paint off with it.... so I used Velcro Command strips and now it's great! Fits perfectly above my desk where I wanted it and expo dry erase markers work wonderfully!! Absolutely love this and so happy I went for it! It sat in my "save for later" for a couple months. I wish I had never waited and maybe I wouldn't have missed the English assignment I had due one day :( no more missed due dates now! Thank you OfficeThink!!
customer_reviews.author: DaughteroftheMostHigh

customer_reviews.title: Just as everyone says, do not used colored dry erase markers
customer_reviews.text: Just as everyone says, the dry erase markers do not come off easily... Resorted to using toothpaste and an old toothbrush to remove colored dry erase. Then had to use a ton of cleaning supplies and constant wiping to get the toothpaste off. Use only black dry erase markers, as for some reason that comes off more easily. Size is excellent, but the markers are definite draw back. Would have purchased something else, if I read the reviews more thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: Large enough to write plenty of notes
customer_reviews.text: We put this up on the wall, and it has been a great tool for keeping appointments organized. The squares are big enough that there is plenty of room for notes. It comes rolled up in a tube, so you have to give it a little time to flatten out, but that is not a problem. We let it sit out overnight with a book on each corner, and the next day we put it up on the wall. Easy to write on, easy to erase, easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: CLL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Received the product rolled, delivered in a cylinder tube just as promised. So no folding or creases to ruin the look or ability to hang cleanly on the wall. It comes with enough tacks to hang on the wall. It’s been up for a few days and it’s perfect. Large spaces to chart all the things I need to do on a daily basis for the scope of work I do. The dry erase markers comes off clean with the eraser it came with. Someone posted a video of it not coming off but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi collette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for those who need organization
customer_reviews.text: Needed a calendar that gave me plenty of space on each day to write all my school assignments down, this one was perfect. It's a huge laminated sheet not a board, so it is easy to move and hang where ever. The push pins (8) that are provided are great to hang calendar on wall! I would have perfered the chisel kind of markers but the ones that are provided do just fine. I recommend this product for anyone who needs a bit of orginaztion in their life. This had been a big help in keeping my schedule on point. 👌
customer_reviews.author: cc_mccall

customer_reviews.title: Quality Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I had a need for a wall calendar that I could put in my puppy room to keep track of when litters needed wormings and vaccines. It is great to see at a glance the full month. The quality of your product is fantastic!! The only thing I would recommend is it took me a while to get it out of the tube. Speaking of that the packaging was great!! Not only was it in a tube, but also in a box. Definitely would buy again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: What would i do without this nice easy calendar ?
customer_reviews.text: 9 am 90 years old and can not see regular sized alendars so this item has solved the problem. just wish there was a pocket to pace the pens in cause i have already lost 2 of them because they rolled off the table where and, i love to show it off to my visitors. And if I could see wel enough to sewm i would make a nice pouch to hang on the wall right next to the calendae so that those pens could not go rolling away. Sincerely, J J Franco i keep them next to the wall . otherwise, this is the best thing i have to keep my doctor dates.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Love my Huge Calender
customer_reviews.text: I am always forgetting when my bills are due so it helps me not to forget. I can write other reminders too, as well as apps. Etc... Plenty of space. Takes up a lot of space on the wall in my office, however it is a office and that's what it's for right! My only wish is that it would have came with wall mounting stuff. Though it was easy to just put pins in each corner.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the busy family!!!
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is awesome. Plenty of room to write, keeps my family organized. They all love putting their stuff on the calendar. We have it on kitchen wall so everyone sees it daily, we haven’t double booked or missed anything since we purchased. A must have for the busy family.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Senn

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Arranging 24/7 care for a loved one was a daunting task, but putting it together on this board made it clear for everyone involved! My husband mounted it to a matched size piece of foam board so we could stand it up. Exactly what I was hoping for. The lined spaces are great, the markers and eraser work well without leaving smears.
customer_reviews.author: kathy w

customer_reviews.title: Large writing space, easy to read - everything you need in one box!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for an office conference room - large enough that you can see it from across the room. Shipped on time - product exactly as described. You get the markers, eraser and the pushpins along with the calendar - everything you need to get it set up immediately. I will purchase from this seller again if we're in the market for similar products!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A big huge calendar in his face marked with Xs for successful days is perfect for this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help keep my husband motivated with his goals. A big huge calendar in his face marked with Xs for successful days is perfect for this. I had a small issue with my first calendar being off center and the owner of the company personally saw to it that my issue was rectified within a timely manner. Super awesome customer service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nia.

customer_reviews.title: Super large - great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I bought it for my office as I have a lot of deadlines and I’m able to write all of my deadlines and other important things on it. This calendar is super large and lots of space to write on. It came with 4 markers, an eraser and nice tacks to fasten it to my wall. Everyone in our office is so envious that I have this!
customer_reviews.author: LitlLotty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best. I love how big it is because it takes up a lot of space on my wall, I was pleasantly surprised to be honest. It’s pretty cool that it comes with the 6 jumbo tacks, colored markers, and an eraser. I write my appointments and my workout stuff on it and everything... I 100% recommend if your looking for something similar to it..
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: The product was received timely and was packaged very well. It fits the bill for a basic dry erase calendar. I didn't realize that it was going to be as thin as it is. I was looking for something a little more substantial. I will need to attach the calendar to some sort of backing then fasten it to the wall. It came with pushpins to hang. Overall, the seller does a great job, it just didn't fully fulfill my needs for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! These were perfect for exactly what I needed. They are easy to use and the packaging was extra good. It was a great buy for my daycare facility.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great calendar!!!
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is HUGE! And that's the point! You can write events all over it, and see them easily --- so you don't forget them! Perfect calendar for what I needed. Easy to put up on the wall ... maybe flatten it out by laying it on a flat surface and weigh it down with some heavy books first for a few days to get the "rolls" out after shipping.
customer_reviews.author: schleppenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! I use it to keep track of ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I use it to keep track of bills, my schedule, and two others in the house and it's perfect. For someone who loves to make lists and organize I love the big spaces and ability to track multiple things on one space. Easy to clean off when you need to re-do anything and super easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my office
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this calendar - it's actually much larger than I thought it would be. I have already gotten many comments from co-workers wanting to know where they can purchase one. I have it hanging above my desk on a wall to organize email campaigns, deadlines, holiday's, and my favorite . . . vacations. :-) This was money well spent to get organized visually. Great quality and I like that the dry-erase markers came with so I didn't have to go out and buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Thomases

customer_reviews.title: Nice and large, plenty of room to write.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! We use it daily. It mounts to the wall with double sided tape. It comes rolled up so you need to put some weight on it to flatten it. It’s quite large, but great to keep the family priorities organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great large print ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact its large and just the right size but even rolled out flat and then trying to pin it sometimes it won't hold and ended up ripping one corner...just word of advice use the flat pins as the ones sent with these are safety hazard for people with toddlers ..caught my toddler just in time ...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Dhandapani

customer_reviews.title: The Best/Perfect product for Classroom and School Building!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I've made. Quick shipping and the product is better than I expected. My colleagues and I use it to post events, quizzes, and tests for students, parents and admin. This is a quality product and the customer service is amazing. Thank you very much for this quality product. My students and I appreciate it dearly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ccho

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is serving its purpose for now. We are actually looking for a black dry erase board calendar a little larger than this, but needed something until we find exactly what we want. The price was good and we used double-sided poster tape to put it up. The only real complaint we have is that the black marker is completely dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is incredible! I bought two for our office, one for present month and one for following month so we could easily see what was ahead of us and what planning needed to be done. I could not have asked for a better calendar!
customer_reviews.author: T. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Just what I was looking for. Even on regular white boards, if you leave the markers on long enough, they're not going to easily wipe off. I've found magic erasers do the trick for me! Couldn't be happier with my new calendar.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Not real whiteboard but not bad
customer_reviews.text: I want to make sure everyone knows that this is not real whiteboard. It's extremely hard to erase just using a whiteboard eraser, you have to use some kind of spray to get the dry erase marker off. However, it's huge and a few command strips put it securely in place. For the price, it's great. Using a spray is a small price to pay for saving a couple hundred $$'s on a real whiteboard this large.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney SimondsTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: my life saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this calendar. I take care of my 89 year old grandma and it is so nice to be able to have her see what is going on in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of the calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the calendar. Makes it easy to see everything on it. its just that the surface makes it a little hard to rub off the erasable marker. I normally write out the month's events on the last day of the previous month. So the writing stays on for about 30 days. I get a good arm workout trying to wipe everything off. I'm going to try another brand of erasable marker and see if that changes anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself since I decided to go back to school. Makes completing and organizing assignments so much easier. Also bought three more for my kids in college. They love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: TXDIVA

customer_reviews.title: 48xd36 not 36x48
customer_reviews.text: The calendar is not as advertised!!! The pictures are deceiving. The calendar is listed as 36x48 when in fact it is 48x36
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: Good, but some kinks
customer_reviews.text: This comes rolled up in a tube and takes awhile to flatten out. It won’t stay up if you don’t take 48 hrs to flatten it. Tacks aren’t great at staying in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Carly McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Apriley
customer_reviews.text: I like the board but was damaged in shipping. Husband thinks I can use a blow dryer to get the wrinkles out. I’ll try because not worth the hassle in looking for shipping material and returning.
customer_reviews.author: angela riley

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get out of the packing tube
customer_reviews.text: Its huge and well packaged. Too well packaged, I actually slightly damaged the calendar by smacking the tube against a stationary object to help get it to slide out. Don't do what I did. Carefully peal away the outer cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: TooLoudBob

customer_reviews.title: I truly love the calendar
customer_reviews.text: I truly love the calendar, but the accessories are not great. First the push pins that were supplied did not hold up the calendar which caused unnecessary wholes in the calendar. My regular sized push pins worked better for the calendar. Also, I am not sure if that eraser was supposed to stick to the calendar, but it did not. My recommendation is to buy the calendar and use standard push pins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whiteboard does it's job, which helps me do mine!
customer_reviews.text: I came with everything I needed, and my office already loves it. We bought two so that staff could see what HR things were coming up for the current and following month. Eraser works great, markers are good quality, and the tacks to hold everything up are doing their job well. Only thing I would change: have different options for marker colors.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi E Behnke

customer_reviews.title: Best Idea I ever had!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this board can be mounted with just a few thumb tacks. There are no major holes left in the wall. It comes with all the tacks needed and 4 colors of erase markers. It rolls up, which is portable and nice. I run a home based business, the daily calendar has ceased marital debates about the schedule. I wish I had found this 4 years ago. Also if you live in an apartment, the Property Manager will appreciate the very small footprint it leaves. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Raider Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking in my office
customer_reviews.text: My employees want this to hang on a wall. I was hesitant about it because most of the calanders are awful looking. I must say this one LOOKS GREAT ON THE WALL. I own an accounting business and I need to look somewhat professional. This wall calander does that
customer_reviews.author: Leisa Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It's AMAZING. I needed this in my life
customer_reviews.text: It's AMAZING. I needed this in my life. The only issue is that some colors stain and I have to scrub a little to get them off. Also I wish it was a little more sturdy. However, it does its job and I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: C.J

customer_reviews.title: I got my calendar and I really like the looks
customer_reviews.text: I got my calendar and I really like the looks. I got the bigger one and it fit perfect. I like all the lines to help me get each day organized. Tacked it up with the tacks included. I’ve weitten in it with markers included. Cole codes and used all colors. Green is not a very good one but the blue, red and black wrote very well. Haven’t erased anything yet so not sure about that part. I’ll update later once I’ve used it for a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Utley

customer_reviews.title: BIG calendar
customer_reviews.text: I got this calendar for our kitchen wall, appointments, kids activities, etc. It is very big and there are no excuses that someone in the family missed or forgot. Love the calendar!!!
customer_reviews.author: CreativemominFL

customer_reviews.title: This is laminated paper
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be a board with a hard backing, but it is just laminated paper. For the $39.99 price tag, was expecting much more. If this was $15, I would find value.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Laminating Job!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a chance to open this, since I wanted to buy a frame. I opened it, and it's a HORRIBLE job! It is created everywhere,and I just saw that the return window is now closed. I'll call my bank.
customer_reviews.author: Mz CEO

customer_reviews.title: a zillion stars.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our large family. Note to self. When you order something this large make sure you have the space to lay it flat when it arrives. Must lay flat for a bit before putting on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Marlbrough

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We use this at work and it’s perfect. Larger squares, easy to read, easy to erase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic calendar!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of 7 busy kids and this calendar is perfect for us. I love how many lines it has for each day! Best purchase ever- It needs a large wall- make sure you get the measurements before you order- it's huge!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this buy
customer_reviews.text: It came ripped and crumpled, for 30$ im so dissapointed. Didnt think it would be like paper. The marker sticks when u wipe it off too. I was just at meijer and saw something way better for 20$ it was cute and framed. So angry i bought this dont waist your money
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The best board ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The best board ever purchased. It is HUGE and it is EXCELLENT QUALITY. I am so much in Love with this planner, as it allows you to write all the stuff for the month ahead. For the price amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchi T

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful but lacks versatility
customer_reviews.text: Great large calendar, however it does not stay straight on the wall I had many many clips and after trying for 2 months, I brought it down. It’s very frustrating, I def tried to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Manci

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS CALENDAR. THE SIZE IS AMAZING, AND ITS LAMINATED. ARE YOU KIDDING ME? THIS IS A GREAT BUY. I RECOMMEND THIS TO ANYONE LOOKING FOR A CALENDAR FOR EVERYDAY USE. THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Everett

customer_reviews.title: Made my teacher heart happy! 🥰
customer_reviews.text: OMGGGG, this is the BEST thing a teacher could EVER have!! I love it sooooo much! It replaced the tape on my board in my classroom & looks so much better! Definitely worth the 5 stars!!!! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and erases with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Apparently this company read some of the poor reviews and made changes. They no longer provide any tape, oversized push pins were provided for hanging. Also zero issues with erasing, dry erase makers provided come right off clean as new.
customer_reviews.author: Jkenny

customer_reviews.title: Now Organized
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this board. Great size. Packaged well. I bought command hanging sticks to hang this poster instead of the push pins that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Poster Like Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Thin like a poster. The tacks are not exactly what I would call jumbo. They look slightly larger than a regular tack. I wish I would not have spent the $30, as I could have made one of similar quality on our school's poster maker. I was expecting something more heavy duty. Hoping this lasts at least through 1 school year.
customer_reviews.author: FL Teacher 2009

customer_reviews.title: Best calendar ever
customer_reviews.text: Best calendar ever. I use it in my kitchen. It’s huge and has a lot of space if you’re a busy person. And the eraser that comes with it works amazingly. No need for any whiteboard spray.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly huge calendar!
customer_reviews.text: Calendar is huge! The boxes are large enough to accommodate my large, loopy handwriting. This calendar is perfect for my cubicle farm for employee days off, full moons, etc. So happy with this calendar!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Would be nice if it came with a frame for support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks almost like art work when people come into your office
customer_reviews.text: JUST GET IT, this is the one, don't take a chance of getting the right one, despite the low price this calendar does it all, looks almost like art work when people come into your office.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Erickson

customer_reviews.title: This was much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was much better than expected!! It's got rigid lines which makes it easer to write on. It came packaged very well. Pushpins/thumbtacks and markers were included.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Big Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and big, however it was quite difficult to get to lay flat. Its a bit bubbly, since all they provide are a few tacks to hold it in place, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: RayaJune

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great service.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect from tracking all the activities of a busy family and children's sports. Excellent product delivered with great service.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick W. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great item & seller
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 12 jumbo laminated calendars to line our conference room walls to keep track of marketing events. We liked them so much, we ordered 3 more. Items delivered in a reasonable amount of time in adequate protective packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Looooove it
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Received it in a very excellent condition. It has a glossy surface which makes it easy to write and erase. The size is what I was looking for. I sticked the calendar with “Command” strips and it looks good 👍🏻.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Giant calendar + many schedules = everything accomplished
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is perfect for us. We hung it in the utility room and with two busy working parents with work dinners, play dates, kids swim lessons, we can't keep things straight. My appointments are red, my husbands are blue, and first come first serve. sounds silly, but now that we have this giant calendar staring us in the face, it makes everything so much easier! 3 cheers to organization!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kells

customer_reviews.title: Sales people with complex travel schedules would appreciate keeping and maintaining something like this in their office
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. Plenty of space to keep track of multiple notes on each day. Sales people with complex travel schedules would appreciate keeping and maintaining something like this in their office.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Easley

customer_reviews.title: it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: the only way to erase colored expo markers is with high concentration rubbing alcohol. Once we figured that out, it works like a charm. Our family has never been so organized!
customer_reviews.author: Careful shopper 315

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Big
customer_reviews.text: nice and big. Only issue is its hard to get it flush to the wall. the push pins that come with it help it stay on wall but once in awhile they will pop out. Had to use double sided sticky tape to really get it looking nice and smooth on wall. Other then that it's been a great addition to my business! markers wipe off easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't erase half the time. Won't unfold fully without some days counter folding which doesn't even really work. Didn't come with thumbtacks. Absolutely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: josh mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a good board that can be attached to a wall with the included tape or you can use thumb tacks (this is what I did). You fill in your own month and days and then you can use it as a weekly planner. It's large in size and fits enough reminder per day.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this product a poor review because I couldn't get the ZenZoi dry erase markers to erase. I ran across another review which suggested Mr. Clean Magic Eraser & it worked like a charm! I am changing my review specifically because after emailing the company to complain they were extremely prompt in their response and immediately offered to replace the product including markers they said would erase more easily - excellent customer service - very rare these days and much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: ericagayle

customer_reviews.title: Works for us!
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect to help keep our family of 5 on tract and know where each of us needs to be! Between softball, baseball, riding lessons and host over things going on during the month.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of this calendar
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this calendar! Quick delivery, too. Large enough to write on to help me and my class stay organized. I need another for my exercise area....would keep me honest about making sure that I put time in gym!!!
customer_reviews.author: love teaching!

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Calendar! This is the second one we have purchased!
customer_reviews.text: The wall calendar is great, the shipping was fast, what more could you want? Since this is the second calendar we've purchased, we knew that we were getting exactly what we wanted and what was advertised! Thanks for such a great product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowBoUno

customer_reviews.title: dry erase board
customer_reviews.text: This is a flexible dry-erase board. You pin it to the wall. It is not in a hard frame. It's large and wonderfully made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True and Honest Review.
customer_reviews.text: It’s frieking huge! I love it. I was expecting it to be a bit “thicker” but it is for sure dry erase. I did not realize that it came with markers and an eraser, so big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail B

customer_reviews.title: Markers don’t erase, not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked better in the picture than in reality. Markers do not wipe off!! I used multiple cleaners and sprays after trying to wipe the chalk erase markers off the board and they refused to budge. The sheet also left adhesive all over the wall once I finally removed the calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This product help me to get my life. Period. Marker erases fully & cleanly. I absolutely recommend it & will be buying another very soon.
customer_reviews.author: FOS

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: I am in college and use this board to keep track of my assignments and social events. I love that the board roles up that way I can store it easily at the end of the school year. I recommend this for an college student or busy adult!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Craft

customer_reviews.title: A lot of money for a laminated calendar. It ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of money for a laminated calendar. It is not very "erasable". It takes some scrubbing, but the remnants of the marker is left behind in a sloppy appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Pnut

customer_reviews.title: love these.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third calendar of the same exact ones.....love these.....I use them in my gym to keep track of workouts.....love being able to see where I've been and where I'm going. Very motivating!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh aight
customer_reviews.text: They roll it up like a mfer. Not a bad purchase tho. Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Barry McCockiner

customer_reviews.title: What we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We purchases a few of these for our office, so that everyone could keep track of events/vacation/deadlines in a visual manner. They are super hard to erase, but we just use a spray bottle of water and a rag (not paper towels).
customer_reviews.author: C. Eng

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my daughter loves it, my wife love's it. It's wonderful product. We needed something like this to organize all our family affairs. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I still can't get the bends out of the edges from when it was rolled in the tube for shipping. I've had it painters taped to the wall. Also dry erase markers do not come off easily and I have to use Mr. Clean Magic Eraser to wipe it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Love this calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar!! Larger than I anticipated, which is awesome. Love that it came with markers, eraser, and large push pins.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This dry erase wall calendar is perfect for planning my days,weeks, & month. The blocks are big enough to write in, & the quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: City of Royston Water Department

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.  Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice calendar with big squares to write down who is going to be gone for practice and performance of a church choir. Erases beautifully with the provided eraser and is big enough that anyone in the room can see who is going to be gone on certain dates.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Huge. Good product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. Plenty of space for all my bills
customer_reviews.author: Sean F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for project planning!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a project in South Africa where we needed white boards in shipping containers that were turned into offices and they are amazing. So practical!
customer_reviews.author: Wanjiku Ndirangu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is exactly what we needed for our office ! It is large, with clear areas to add our appointments, birthdays, etc. for us to communicate the comings and goings of the month. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Paula I. Renaud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. An easy-to-read large monthly planner for an operations center. We're very pleased with the quality and think it will be in our ops center for many years.
customer_reviews.author: MJO

customer_reviews.title: Boss Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a white board type calendar with one month on it that was big enough you can see across a room. We found it with your product. we have just received it and my boss was so happy (she took us to lunch). Thank you for the wonderful product It will make scheduling easy to read for our clients. So again Thank you from the Salinas Chinatown Learning Center.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Finally large enough dry-erase calendar to write one. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A lot bigger than I thought, but I like it. Good quality material, and doesn't leave residue over after erasing. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Watson

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: This calendar is BIG and just what we needed to keep track of all our monthly events. Plenty of room to write in each square. The plastic is thick and pliable, no rips or folds from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: HRN

product_meta.title: Jumbo Dry Erase Laminated Wall Calendar, Huge 36 Inch by 48 Inch Size, Monthly Planner for Home Office Classroom, Large Date Boxes, Reusable PET Film, Never Folded, Bonus 5 Markers, 8 Tacks, 1 Eraser
feature_bullets: EASY BREEZY ERASING: We developed a unique OfficeThink PET Film that years later will easily erase dry and wet erase markers. So, go ahead and use as many colors and thick lines as you want on this calendar because erasing is a breeze.

ITEMS INCLUDED: With every calendar you will receive 5 dry erase markers, a high quality eraser and 8 jumbo tacks so you can attach the calendar to any wall of your choosing! This is the ultimate package for any organizing pro.

NEVER FOLDED, SENT ROLLED: Unlike other companies, we never fold our calendars. To ensure you never receive creased lines or wrinkles on your calendar, each of our calendars are gently rolled and prepped so it gets to your front door without a single blemish.

TAKE ORGANIZATION TO THE NEXT LEVEL: This calendar is massive (4 ft by 3 ft) with extra-large 5 inches by 6.5 inches date squares. We even added a spacious “special notes” section (5 inches by 32.5 inches) for all your planning needs. Whether you use it for your family, business, or classroom, you’ll find yourself planning like you never have before.
LIFETIME WARRANTY and 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: With easy registration after purchase.
